name: A Circle Among Squares 2
description:
Now mastering Pause mechanics and diagonal movement, the Circle is tired of giving Enemy Squares an honorable death. To show its contempt and superiority, it shall outmaneuver them and their pathetic bullets and reach the Goal Square in all the 100 Levels of this game. The Enemy Squares, turned red, have lots of new tricks to prevent this.

Dodge all bullets and enemies and reach the goal location in 100 Levels. Enemies come in a variety of types, speeds and action patterns. A single hit kills you. Failing a level has no consequences. Though fewer in number, Levels are longer than the previous game.

Game Elements

You're the Circle. If it is touched by a bullet or an enemy, you must retry the level. Has the exclusive abilities of pausing the game and moving diagonally.

This is the floor. Anyone can move freely above it.

This is the Goal Square. Step over it to win the current Level.

This is a Normal Enemy. It can shoot in 8 directions, usually choosing the closest to your current position.

The Invisible Enemy has the same behaviour, but cannot be seen.

This is a Four-Shots Enemy. It shoots in 4 directions simultaneously.

This is a Diagonal-Shots Enemy. It shoots in 4 diagonal directions simultaneously.

This is an Eight-Shots Enemy. It shoots in 8 directions simultaneously.

This is an Aimed-Shots Enemy. It always shoots at your current position.

This is a Slow-Shots Enemy. It acts like a Normal Enemy, but shoots slower bullets.

This is a Sequence-Shots Enemy. It shoots 8 bullets in very quick succession.

This is a Quick-Shots Enemy. It acts like a Normal Enemy, but shoots faster bullets.

This is a Following-Shots Enemy. It acts like a Normal Enemy, but shoots a special bullet that follows the Circle.

This is the bullet most enemies shoot. It will disappear after some distance is covered.

This is the bullet the Following-Shots Enemies shoot. It follows the Circle for some distance and then disappears.

This is a Block Square. Nothing can pass or destroy it.

This a Reflective Square. Nothing can pass it and bullets are reflected.

This is a Teleportation Square. It always comes in a pair and only you can step over it.

This is a hole. It blocks movement but not bullets.

Features
  • 100 Levels
  • 10 Types of Enemies, plus a special Final Level Boss
  • Enemies' speed and shooting rate may vary between slow and very quick
  • Enemies may follow you or be static
  • Block, reflection and teleport elements
  • Pause the Level whenever you want
  • Diagonal movement exclusive to you
  • Autosave
  • Minimalist design
  • Xbox Controller Support
Keyboard Controls

There's no mouse input.

  • Start/Confirm/Pause = Space/Enter
  • Move = Up/Left/Down/Right, W/A/S/D, Numpad 8/4/2/6
  • Exit = Esc
  • Options = O
Xbox Controller Controls
  • Start/Confirm/Pause = A
  • Move = Arrow Buttons/Left Analog Stick
  • Exit = Select
  • Options = LB
System Requirements
  • OS = Microsoft Windows 8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor = Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory = 4 GB RAM
  • GPU = Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • DirectX = Version 9.0 or better
  • Storage = 500 MB available space
  • Display = Recommended 1104x624 or better
